# Strings



```{r}
ex1 <- c("Ashland","Bayfield","Douglas","Adams","Buffalo","Jefferson")
ex2 <- c("Chinook Salmon","Coho Salmon","Chum Salmon",
         "Pink Salmon","Sockeye Salmon","Salmon")
ex3 <- c("WD40","JB80","R2D2","C3PO","Run DMC","AC/DC")

str_view(ex1,"l")
str_view(ex1,"la")

str_view(ex1,".l.")
str_view(ex1,".la.")

str_view(ex1,"^A")
str_view(ex1,"^A.")

str_view(ex1,"s$")
str_view(ex1,".s$")

str_view(ex2,"Salmon")
str_view(ex2,"^Salmon$")

str_view(ex3,"\\d")
str_view(ex3,"\\s")
str_view(ex1,"[sl]")
str_view(ex1,"[^sl]")

str_view(ex1,"a|l")
str_view_all(ex1,"a|l")

str_view(ex1,"[AEIOU]")
str_view(ex1,"[^AEIOU]")
str_view(ex1,"[aeiou]")

str_view(ex1,"ff?")
str_view(ex1,"ff+")
str_view(ex1,"ff*")
str_view(ex1,"ff{1}")

str_view(ex1,"l")
str_detect(ex1,"l")
ex1[str_detect(ex1,"l")]
str_count(ex1,"l")

str_replace(ex1,"f","-")
str_replace_all(ex1,"f","-")
str_replace(ex1,"[a|f]","-")
str_replace_all(ex1,"[a|f]","-")

str_replace_all(ex1,c("a"="-","f"="*"))

str_split(ex2,"\\s")
str_split(ex2,"\\s",simplify=TRUE)
str_split(ex2,"\\s",simplify=TRUE,n=1)

str_view_all(ex2,boundary("word"))
str_view_all(ex2,boundary("character"))
str_view_all(ex2,boundary("line"))


```
